website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the comfort level and simple design of the Under Armour Charged Toccoa 2 made the majority of the users happy and contented. In addition to its design, they admired the excellent fit of the running footwear. Although one of the users was not satisfied with its arch support, others still recommend the shoe because of its performance on different walking, running, and hiking activities.
pros: The majority of the users said that the Under Armour Charged Toccoa 2 is comfortable to wear
Some of the testers commented that the shoe provides a perfect fit
One of the buyers agreed that the running shoe has excellent traction
According to a user, the shoe is best used for hiking and street walking
A reviewer appreciated the color of the running shoe
A consumer loves its simple laces
It was stylish, based on the reviews
cons: A consumer commented that the shoe is better if it provides more arch support
Some wearers found the durability of the shoe to be inadequate

customer_reviews.title: unusually comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My son only wears Under Armour shoes but he usually find them too tight and narrow for this normal size. Well, not this particular model... He loves the fit and he says they are very comfortable. I do think they are a bit on the heavier side but it has good cushion and traction on the bottom. Seems like a solid build and should last long time. This one fits as expected! Hope this was useful... and if it was, please click on the helpful button below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DavidsList 📝👍💬✅

customer_reviews.title: Great support for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot, so have tended to lean toward Under Armour running shoes over the past several years. When I run, I prefer my shoes to be laced down tight and snug, and this shoe allows me to do that. It's also quite light with enough padding to adequately reduce impact on my knees. Overall, a good shoe so far.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe as is always the case with Under Armor. However, these shoes took a while to break in and feel as comfortable as some other Under Armor shoes I have bought in the past. I suppose that makes sense since these are more cost effective. I would still recommend these, but next time I will spend the extra $20 and get the better version.
customer_reviews.author: Jdk541

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use UA products for all workout apparel. Great product line 95% of the time...Very disappointed in these shoes as I wore them a few times a week to workout. After about a month and half the right shoe had plastic coming through and rubbing the back of my heel. Sharp, and extremely uncomfortable. No other wear on these shoes but this. Would never buy this style again from UA. Worn maybe 30 times and now junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite sneaker brand. It fits just right for a medium. This is not for a wide fit, no sliding around inside. There is good tracktion, stability, and overall comfort. Often brands come out with a great model and have to change it or discontinue it. So I'm glad to have tried Under Armour and I'm sure you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size?
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the shoes were narrower than expected. I originally thought that they were also short, however on further examination I believe that was actually due to the design of the upper. The heel area of the upper forces the foot forward. I am hoping that with some wear and compression of the padding they may loosen up a bit. They appear to be very well constructed, but I don't yet know how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Seems rugged enough for trail running
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to run in local state park and wildlife area on gravelly roads and trails. They seem rugged enough. Fit is good. Construction appears to be bolstered near the heel to prevent punctures.
customer_reviews.author: I Liketh Reading

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got the Under Armour Men's Charged Toccoa 2 Running Shoes, for my Husband. He really like the black with the gray on the sides instead of the typical white. He wears a size 15, so it's hard to find shoes in his size, and he said they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marinah

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Size Larger!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I'm size 11us, but had to buy a 12 to get properly fit. Aside from that, these are quite comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don't even waste my time shopping for other brands. I have tried several. Under Armour shoes are the best! They look great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Webbuyer

customer_reviews.title: AFFORDABLE QUALITY RUNNING SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Decent-looking, good cushioning, great price. Durability with moderate use remains to be seen. Cons: Needs more arch support.
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks good. My wife loves how they look on me. Very comfortable and feels great running with them. If these hold up and they seem like they will, would buy again. Great shoe overall!
customer_reviews.author: Floridalife3265

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are very comfortable and great for exercise. So far, they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is good comfortable and nice color. my husband like it .
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My husband was extremely Pleased with these shoes!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christian.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable as craaaap
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime lover of the UA Toccoa first version, I had them for like 2 years and beat the crap out of them. These are not as good IMO, They are almost nothing alike besides being wide, comfy, durable shoes. That doesn't mean they aren't good though. They are very comfortable and pretty wide which I need. They also have good tread for trails. Great cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This is my first UA shoes. I am thrilled with the high quality, and great design. This shows is one of the most comfy shoes I’ve ever purchased. I highly recommend it. So happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alibage

customer_reviews.title: If you have Flintstone toes
customer_reviews.text: Tight in toe box, if you have flint stone toes go half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Feels better than the original Taccoa
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe but I ended up exchanging them for a different pair. I just liked the colors on the older taccoa better but the shoe felt and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour shoes fit a bit snug so I went up a size , I wear a 13 in most brands so I ordered a pair in 14 . The 14's fit perfectly. I love the styling and rugged grip . These are my favorite shoes .
customer_reviews.author: APRIL MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes for a better price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit really well, especially since I have high arches. Are extremely comfortable and have great cushion for the impact of running everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gobert

customer_reviews.title: these are a good bang for ya buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to ware to work (warehouse) because they didn't seem overpriced for what I wanted them for. Fit as they should and have a nice cushion you can feel when you walk
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, very comfortable, and love the color. Good job Under armor
customer_reviews.author: FLETCH

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is smaller and shorter than regular size. Order larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Tynan

customer_reviews.title: Cut too small
customer_reviews.text: A 12 fit me like an 11. Go a full size bigger than you wear
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I like it all the way
customer_reviews.text: the shoe material is solid and rugged. It is really supportive to my foot, it is not soft. I recommend it for running and exercise, but it is not the best for a random walking where you need something soft and more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to stand all day and to walk. I love the brightness of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes for walking. I like the neutral elevation of the heel in respect to the toe, easy on the back for long walking/standing situations. I do not like that the insoles are not removable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are great. Using them to train for my first ultra. I like them more then the HOVR
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rice

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy , just get them.
customer_reviews.text: Needed some better support for work. Im always on my feet , I have to say great value for my money
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose shoe
customer_reviews.text: All around great shoe. Fits well and is comfortable to run in, especially trail running.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Brolaski

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & looks good because of excellent shape design
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: look nice and fit pertect
customer_reviews.text: theey fit perfect good for my work the floors are slick
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The shous ariive fast, they are comfterbole, and feats very good.
customer_reviews.author: Yafit

customer_reviews.title: Just great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes for running! Fit great too
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and value - am very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! I wear them for casual purposes, as well as during my workouts; great value!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Maybe doesn't fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe hurts my upper foot, hopefully the more I wear them it will go away
customer_reviews.author: charger350

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this show. Looks amazing. Favorite pair of shoes I’ve owned so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

product_meta.title: Under Armour - Mens Charged Toccoa 2 Trail Shoes
product_meta.description: Find solitude among the pines and evergreens with the help of the Under Armour® Charged Toccoa 2 hiking shoes. Predecessor: Charged Toccoa. Support Type: Neutral. Cushioning: Lightweight, flexible response. Surface: Trail. Differential: 8 mm. Ripstop textile with durable leather overlays. Traditional lace-up closure. Cushioned tongue and collar. Full-length EVA sockliner adds comfort and stability. Cushioned EVA midsole provides a lightweight and responsive ride. High-abrasion rubber outsole provides reliable traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 12 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Upper combines lightweight, breathable mesh with synthetic overlays for durability & support
Die-cut, full-length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit
Dual-layer Charged Cushioning midsole is firmer below the heel & softer below the forefoot for a blend of support & comfort that's built to perform
High-abrasion rubber traction outsole pattern for extended durability & grip out on
